mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To create a collection of minimalist clothing that allows you to express your personal style while maintaining a clean, sophisticated look.

about.title: Essence
about.content:
ғʀᴇᴀᴋ ̶m̶i̶n̶i̶m̶a̶l̶i̶s̶m̶ was founded in January 2023 as a company with a passion for art and fashion.

Our focus is on creating unique and exclusive embroidered clothing, as well as original 3D pieces and restoring unique items, all crafted with our unique artistic style.

ғʀᴇᴀᴋ ̶m̶i̶n̶i̶m̶a̶l̶i̶s̶m̶ has a lot to offer, so stay tuned.

In our store you'll find items you won't find anywhere else, pieces that we at ғʀᴇᴀᴋ ̶m̶i̶n̶i̶m̶a̶l̶i̶s̶m̶ are proud to wear and showcase daily. However, if you don't find that perfect item that matches your personal style, feel free to contact us with your own idea and we'll be thrilled to bring it to life.

customizePage.description: At Freak Minimalism, we understand that every individual is unique. That's why we offer a customization service to ensure you get exactly what you want.

leadTime.description: Custom orders take approximately 2-3 weeks to complete. This allows us to ensure the highest quality and attention to detail.
